participant_1.background:
I've been lucky enough to avoid any physical altercations in my lifetime.
i am a shy person but i love to sing.
i have 3 thumbs.
my favorite food is macaroni and cheese.
I keep up with my family but I am not always sure if they keep up with me.

participant_2.background:
I like to read about puppy training and dog care on my lunch breaks.
i enjoy swimming.
I'm enjoying my time after college, jogging is a great way to stay in shape.
I don't own a home, but I do enjoy playing music and interacting with my listeners.
i am from tennessee.

content.text: Hey!
Hey there!  What's up?
Not much, just enjoying my lunch break.  What about you?
I'm reading about puppy training.  I'm thinking of getting a dog soon.
Oh, nice!  I love dogs!  I have a dog named Buddy.  He's a big Golden Retriever.
Golden Retrievers are the best!  I've always wanted one.
You should get one!  They're great dogs.  They're friendly, loving, and they're great for families.
Maybe I will!  Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem!  What else do you like to do?
I love to swim.  I'm a lifeguard at my local pool.
That's awesome!  I love to swim too.  I used to be on my high school swim team.
Really?  That's cool!  I've always wanted to be on a swim team.
It was a lot of fun.  We practiced a lot, but we also had a lot of fun.
That sounds like a great time.  I'm glad you enjoyed it.
Thanks!  What else do you like to do?
I like to play music.  I play guitar and sing.  I'm also a radio DJ.
That's awesome!  I love to play music too.  I play piano and sing.
That's awesome!  Do you want to play something together sometime?
Sure!  That would be fun!
Great!  I'll send you my number.
Sounds good
